package.description: The utility class includes node and object help functions.

method.name: getDate
method.param: Bit indicating whether to return the date as the time, or the date object.

method.name: evaluateElementHandler
method.param: The name of an attribute that includes JavaScript.
method.description: Evaluates an attribute on an XHTML Node (e.g.: onclick)

method.name: merge
method.return-value: A hash of the specified value.
method.description: Merges an internal object into the specified.

method.name: absorb
method.description: Copies the source array into the target array.

index.description: The utility class includes node and object help functions.
